greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 1 + 2 * least i such that A103509(i)=n+1, 0 if no such i exists.
mathematica: Array[a, 500]; Do[a[n] = 0, {n, 1, 500}]; n = 9; ct = 0; While[ct < 150, m = 3; While[ ! (PrimeQ[m] && (((n - m)/2) > 2) && PrimeQ[(n - m)/2]), m = m + 2]; k = PrimePi[m]; If[a[k] == 0, a[k] = n; ct = ct + 1]; n = n + 2]; Print[a]
program: (define (first-n-where-fun_n-is-i1 fun i) (let loop ((n 1)) (cond ((= i (fun n)) n) (else (loop (+ n 1))))))
results.author: _Lei Zhou_, Feb 10 2005
ext: Edited and Scheme-code added by _Antti Karttunen_, Jun 19 2007
